bioconda.name: bioconductor-clusterstab
bioconda.summary: Compute cluster stability scores for microarray data

biotools.summary: This package can be used to estimate the number of clusters in a set of microarray data, as well as test the stability of these clusters.

bioschemas.name: clusterStab
bioschemas.summary: This package can be used to estimate the number of clusters in a set of microarray data, as well as test the stability of these clusters.
